text: The 2000–01 season is ES Sétif's 31st season in the Algerian top flight, They will be competing in National 1, and the Algerian Cup. ==Squad list== Players and squad numbers last updated on 1 September 2000. Note: Flags indicate national team as has been defined under FIFA eligibility rules.
